item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: This code of conduct outlines our expectations for participants within the Matrix community, as well as steps for reporting unacceptable behaviour. We are committed to providing a welcoming and inspiring community for all, and expect our code of conduct to be honoured. Anyone who violates this code of conduct may be banned from the community. This applies to communication in any room of the Python community Matrix Space #python-community:matrix.
